main event: A bright unidentified object was observed at Avon Park, Florida, on October 26, 1957, emitting a reddish glow with a white halo.
interesting points: The object was observed for several minutes before disappearing rapidly,No associated sound was noted during the sighting,Several witnesses reported the sighting, the object resembled a jet aircraft but was much larger,The weather conditions were clear and no other aircraft were present in the area.
sighted object: a bright light with a reddish glow and a white halo
witness description: Civilians at the Avon Park Bombing Range Office
